langDescription.message: Show all available information about memory and processor

langCapacityDescription.message: The total amount of physical memory capacity, in bytes

langAvailableCapacityDescription.message: The amount of available capacity, in bytes

langArchName.message: The architecture name of the processors

langModelName.message: The model name of the processors

langFeatures.message: A set of feature codes indicating some of the processor's capabilities. The currently supported codes are mmx, sse, sse2, sse3, ssse3, sse4_1, sse4_2, and avx

langProcessorsUser.message: The cumulative time used by userspace programs on this processor

langProcessorsKernel.message: The cumulative time used by kernel programs on this processor

langProcessorsIdle.message: The cumulative time spent idle by this processor

langProcessorsTotal.message: The total cumulative time for this processor. This value is equal to user + kernel + idle
